document_data.name: House Ahmaquissar
document_data.Activities: It is known for accommodating minstrels, [[rogue|thieves]] and con artists. Members commonly ventured to [[Faer√ªn]] to ply their roguish trades before returning to [[Evermeet]] to evade punishment.
document_data.Base of operations: The house possessed several estates on Evermeet, but its main estate in [[Leuthilspar]] was a wood and marble building.
document_data.Members: * [[Lysanthir Ahmaquissar]], leader of the house in 1367 DR.
